description:
This course is designed to uncover the secrets to healthier eating and loosing weight. I have done this in a easy to follow 6 week detox programe. You can follow along step by step or take the course at your own pace. The information on this course is guaranteed to help you succeed with all your goals.

I do something different to the other diets plans or books you may read. In this course I explain the science, so you can better understand what's going on in your body and why what you've been told about loosing weight isn't always true.

The course is structured to make it easy to digest. But if your keen, your able to take the entire course in an evening and apply the principles across your own 6 week timeline using the information and help I have provided.

I will also be adding recipe ideas along the way to make it easier for you to choose the right foods.
title: THE SCIENCE & SECRETS TO WEIGHT LOSS.
